text: Dagen is a Christian daily newspaper in Sweden. The first issue was published on 1 November 1945. Lewi Pethrus, leader of the pentecostal movement in Sweden was its founder and its chief editor until his death in 1974. == Circulation == As of 2017, Statista estimates its current circulation to be in 15,700. == References == ==Other website== * Official website Category:1945 establishments in Sweden Category:Christianity in Sweden Category:Newspapers published in Sweden
title: Dagen
